id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [Wake-on-LAN Button](https://esphome.io/components/button/wake_on_lan.html#configuration-variables)*

target_mac_address.docs:
**MAC Address**: The MAC Address of the target computer.

*See also: [Wake-on-LAN Button](https://esphome.io/components/button/wake_on_lan.html#configuration-variables)*
